The Okamoto Corp would appear to be a major manufacturer of socks in Japan.  They have both an English and Japanese site.  I found it somewhat convoluted when I went to the website root and tried to open the link above, but I discovered the link above in an unrelated search.  There is quite a bit of history about the samurai and clothing.
